about_the_game:
Arcade Manager Demo
Build the arcade of your dreams in Arcade Manager! Start with a few machines, funky carpet, and sticky floors, then grow your business into a bustling entertainment hub. Place classic games like pinball and claw machines, manage your staff, customize your space, and keep the customers happy. Watch as your tiny arcade expands to 500 times its original size! From setting jackpots to dealing with pizza slices in coin slots, you'll experience all the thrills and challenges of running your own arcade. Can you create the ultimate gaming destination and become the Arcade Manager? Grow your arcade empire and become a tycoon.

Animated Fun Arcade games for your customers

  • Crane Games

  • Coin Pushers

  • Bowling

  • Air Hockey

  • Dance Games

  • Hit Target Throwing Games

  • Pinball

  • Motorcycle Racing Game

  • Unlock the lock game

  • Lightgun game

  • Arcade Cabinet

  • Japanese styled arcade cabinet

  • Ball Drop Arcade Game

  • Coin Pusher

  • Ring Toss

  • Pong Game

  • Vortex Game

  • Bowling Game

  • Big Wheel Spin

  • Ticket Checker

  • Lots of furniture objects

Events

Create events in your arcade light high score challenges, speed running, dance tournaments and more!

Economy / Management Manage your finances in Arcade Manager by adjusting the costs per credits when guests enter the arcade. Set different credit costs per machine, adjust jackpot settings like the odds of hitting a jackpot and the payout of the jackpot. Hire Staff each with different stats, like how fast they will repair/clean and how expensive they are. Events cost money and can be adjusted how big the event prize is.
